TopicTitle: I think I just realized how to control SRB thrust!

Articles.Content: Mount some liquid engines upside down on top of the SRBs. If you\'re going really fast and need to shut down, simply throttle up on the inverted liquid engines to cancel out the thrust of the solid rocket boosters.
What scenario do you have in mind where it could possibly be a good idea to use opposing thrusters to tune net thrust? \'All rockets are free and we need fireworks\'-day?

This is the very definition of 'MOAR BOOSTERS!!'

Interesting concept, I definitely want to try this out.

Wonder if NASA ever thought of this for the space shuttle..
I\'ve put aerospike engines on the front of aircraft to give a nice MiG look. They also double as airbrakes.
